long_description: Wear the women's Briza Hoodie from Royal Robbins on travels abroad or trips to the climbing gym. The soft, stretchy fabric moves with you, dries quickly and resists wrinkles. Briza dri-release(R) blends polyester, cotton and spandex to wick moisture, dry fast and stretch to keep you comfortable on the go; it also helps inhibit odor. Mesh insets on yoke, sleeves and back vent excess heat and let cooler air in. 2-tone drawstring lets you snug the hood. Zip pocket secures small items. The women's Royal Robbins Briza Hoodie features a regular fit and straight hem.
short_description: Wear the women's Briza Hoodie from Royal Robbins on travels abroad or trips to the climbing gym. The soft, stretchy fabric moves with you, dries quickly and resists wrinkles.
